column4: my java is not working in firefox it just stoped working and i have java selected in firefox preferences and i also reinstalled it
might be a flash problem too
perhaps just reboot your computer than?
something must have been changed than?
open a terminal and type: sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
no, now go to firefox and uninstall the flash plugin, and reinstall it:)
open firefox and press: Tools > Add-ons
than go to google and type: Flash player....go to adobe's website and choose the correct one (Ubuntu 8.04+ .deb package)
I cant think if any other direct solution than...im sorry
perhaps you can install Opera, see if that browser can play your movies?
